def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_close = all_close([x,y], ctx)
        check_xy_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_xy_light_grey = all([is_light(dot, ctx) and is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_y_smaller_x = are_smaller([y], [x], ctx)
        check_y_below_right_x = are_below_right([y], [x], ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_close
            and check_xy_large
            and check_xy_light_grey
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_below_right_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

        check_y_middle = are_middle([y], [x,y,z], ctx)
        check_y_larger_x = are_larger([y], [x], ctx)
        check_y_light_grey = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_z_bottom_right = z == get_bottom_right([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_z_smaller_y = are_smaller([z], [y], ctx)
        check_z_slightly_darker_y = are_darker([z], [y], ctx)
        check_z_slightly_lighter_x = are_lighter([z], [x], ctx)
        check_z_slightly_darker_x = are_darker([z], [x], ctx)

            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_top
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_middle
            and check_y_larger_x

            and check_z_bottom_right
            and check_z_smaller_y
            and check_z_slightly_darker_y
            and check_z_slightly_lighter_x
            and check_z_slightly_darker_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # Follow up question.
    results = []
    for a,b in state:
        top_one = get_top([a,b], ctx)
        middle_one = get_bottom([a,b], ctx)
        bottom_one = get_bottom([middle_one], ctx)
        check_middle_lighter = are_lighter([middle_one], [top_one], ctx)
        check_middle_smaller = are_smaller([middle_one], [top_one], ctx)
        check_middle_below = are_below([middle_one], [top_one], ctx)
        check_bottom_lighter = are_lighter([bottom_one], [middle_one], ctx)
        check_bottom_smaller = are_smaller([bottom_one], [middle_one], ctx)
        check_bottom_below = are_below([bottom_one], [middle_one], ctx)
        if (
            check_middle_lighter
            and check_middle_smaller
            and check_middle_below
            and check_bottom_lighter
            and check_bottom_smaller
            and check_bottom_below
        ):
            results.append([a,b])
    return results
state = turn(state)
